name: Nibiru
description: Inanna travels through time and space to the planet of her ancestors to avoid chaos in the galaxies. Inanna must stop the interplanetary destruction that will trigger the end of time and uncover the truth about the past to secure her future. Make tough choices that have impacted not just you, but the entire galaxy in the past, present and future. Nibiru is an Arcade-Top Down Arena Shooter with a focus on narrative. Advance through hordes of enemies across the arena, collect powerful relics that augment and change Inanna's fighting style, fight in the material and astral world, face challenging bosses and defeat everyone in your path.
